headline.main: Fat on Thighs and Paunches Is the Fate of All Mammals

docs.lead_paragraph: FEW things in life are as vexing as the talent that fat has for gathering in unsightly pockets and paunches at particular spots around the body: jiggling on the thighs, bulging out from the belly, flapping down from the triceps. But distressing though such fat deposits are, they may simply be the price people pay for being mammals.
